name: 葛如鈞
objective:
本課程的主要目的是教授學生區塊鏈技術的基本概念與應用，激發學生在區塊鏈領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：區塊鏈概論、區塊鏈的基本工作原理、區塊鏈安裝、智能合約製作、設計思考、區塊鏈與物聯網、區塊鏈的金融應用、區塊鏈的產業應用
This course is to teach students the basic concepts and applications of blockchain technology and to inspire students for innovative blockchain applications. The course includes: blockchain introduction, blockchain working principles, blockchain installation, smart contract development, design thinking, blockchain and internet of things, financial applications of blockchain and industrial applications of blockchain.
